thread.title: More Realistic Bulk-Mail Pricing Would Help USPS

author: wsjcom
title: More Realistic Bulk-Mail Pricing Would Help USPS
text:
Holman Jenkins’s “The Post Office and Trump’s Culture War” (Business World, April 21) addresses part of the problem with the USPS, those being congressional interference and union “negotiated” personnel costs. What is missing is the impact of the actual costs of business-related activities on the Post Office. A normal one-ounce, first-class letter now costs 50 cents to mail, even within the same ZIP Code. At the same time, bulk-rate mail, without regard to weight, goes cross-country for a fraction of that cost.
My mail box...
